org.codice.solr.factory

Class ConfigurationFileProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.solr.factory.ConfigurationFileProxy

  • public class ConfigurationFileProxy
extends Object
    Abstraction layer for accessing files or directories on disk. Provides different implementations depending on if the code is run within an OSGi container or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        protected org.osgi.framework.BundleContext getContext()

      • writeBundleFilesTo

        public void writeBundleFilesTo(File configDir)
        Writes the solr configuration files out of the bundle onto the disk. This method requires that the dataDirectoryPath has been set. If the code is run in an OSGi container, it will automatically have a default dataDirectory location set and will not require setting dataDirectory ahead of time.

      • getDataDirectory

        public File getDataDirectory()
        Returns:
        the File of the directory where data can be written, should never return null
